eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Bexar; Brewster; El Paso; Harris; Hidalgo; Tarrant; Travis; Val Verde; Webb, TX; at 12:00 AM ON JAN 6, 2026 Effective until 01:00 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: THIS IS A TEST OF THE EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM. IF THIS HAD BEEN AN ACTUAL EMERGENCY, YOU WOULD HAVE BEEN GIVEN ADDITIONAL INSTRUCTIONS. THIS IS A TEST. No action required.
